content.question: Which of the following represents the correct calculation for the fuel efficiency of the automobile?

choices.label: <math alttext="65 miles per hour divided by 55 miles per hour" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>65</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mph</mtext><mo>/</mo><mn>55</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mph</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="75 miles per hour divided over 55 miles per hour" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>miles</mtext><mo>/</mo><mn>55</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mph</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="65 miles per hour divided over 2.8 gallons" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>65</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mph</mtext><mo>/</mo><mn>2.8</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>gallons</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="75 miles divided over 2.8 gallons" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>miles</mtext><mo>/</mo><mn>2.8</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>gallons</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="75 miles divided over 2.8 gallons" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>miles</mtext><mo>/</mo><mn>2.8</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>gallons</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Determine an approach or method aligned with the problem to be solved.
